Story.data: Jina had a black box. She kept her clip, pen and brush in it. She kept the box in her bag.  The bag had a flag print on it.
On a hot day, Rob, the frog went to the beach. There he went for a swim. He found the water to be very cool. He was happy.
Joy is my cat and she is fat. She plays with dogs in the park. When she comes back, she takes a nap.
Amol went to the zoo and had a lot of fun. There he went near a deer. It was thin and small. It had long legs.
